ing: 1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
des: "This lightly-flavored bean dip is a great appetizer. It is quick and easy to make. Serve with tortilla chips."
ins: Combine the black beans, balsamic vinegar, ketchup, apple cider vinegar, salt, onion powder, and chili powder in a food processor; pulse until creamy. Serve at room temperature.
